thread.title: customer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by customer

author: customer
title: customer
text:
Ordered a Barbour jacket in the sale. Process was simple and straightforward. The jacket arrived the following day via courier.
Unfortunately it was too short so had to be sent back. The returns process was just as simple. Free return label was provided and money refunded within days.
I'm very happy with my online shopping experience with Country Attire
